column1: If the Petitioner had not availed himself of the right to appeal which was available
to him, and invoking the revisionary jurisdiction of this Court, there is a duty
cast  upon  the  Petitioner  to  satisfy  this Court  as  to  why  he did  not  invoke  the
appellate  jurisdiction.  Failing  which,  the  Petitioner  cannot  proceed  with  the
Application for revision. An Application for revision is available where the failure
to exercise the right to appeal is explained to the satisfaction of the Court.
